basics.name: Devi Adi Nufriana
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Engineer specializing in frontend development with React and Vue. Proven track record of optimizing web applications for performance and user experience. Skilled in modernizing legacy systems and implementing test-driven development.

work.name: Blibli
work.summary: Frontend Engineer leading UI modernization and performance optimization initiatives. Spearheaded migration of legacy systems to Vue.js and implemented comprehensive integration testing.
highlights: Implemented Playwright integration tests, reducing regression issues by 40%
Led UI modernization of Detail page, improving user engagement by 25%
Migrated Review Center from Java to Vue.js, improving maintainability
Refactored core components using Vue 3, enhancing code reusability

work.name: Frisidea
work.summary: Full-stack Developer leading modernization of web and mobile applications. Successfully migrated 'Mylife' app to Flutter and implemented modern React practices.
highlights: Migrated 'Mylife' app to Flutter, improving performance by 30%
Modernized TMLI web app using React hooks, reducing complexity by 40%
Built customer care portal serving 10,000+ daily users
Optimized web apps using ViteJS, reducing build times by 60%

work.name: Glovory
work.summary: Backend Developer specializing in database architecture and API development. Designed scalable database solutions and built robust RESTful APIs.
highlights: Designed SQL database architecture, optimizing query performance by 45%
Led data migration projects with 100% data integrity
Developed RESTful APIs handling 1000+ requests per second
Implemented database optimization, reducing response time by 50%

work.name: BRI Life
work.summary: Full-stack Developer responsible for modernizing mobile and web applications. Led migration of 'Mylife' app to Flutter and implemented modern React practices.
highlights: Migrated 'Mylife' app to Flutter, improving app store ratings by 1.5 stars
Developed Digiform web app serving 50,000+ monthly users
Built customer care app reducing service resolution time by 40%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 70%

projects.name: Sistem Skripsi
projects.description: The thesis process becomes more organized and faster, carried out online and can be accessed anywhere via a browser with the aim of saving time, energy and making it easier to obtain information on the thesis process online.
